pages.text: The witch's cauldron is an upgraded cauldron used to create magical substances and custom brews (WIP). $(br2)The cauldron must be placed over a heat source to boil and may require altar power.$(br2)If a Cauldron does not have sufficient heat or power, the brew will turn brown and spoil, which must be removed.

Use anointing paste on a regular cauldron to turn it into a Witch's cauldron.$(br2)A brew may be created by filling the cauldron with water and dropping the correct items in the correct order into the cauldron.
